channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15275] Stuck thread while pulling data
item.description:
I am trying to put data into an hbase table. It works for some time and gets stuck. Please find the stack trace. Is this related to HBASE-15140 and can i apply the same fix.

2016-02-16 16:13:12
Full thread dump Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (24.79-b02 mixed mode):

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Resolving as duplicate of HBASE-15140 Please try it and then if it does not work for you, then open an issue. Thanks.
